name: Urban Photo Tour
description: Do you want to see Buenos Aires through the eyes of a street photographer and lifelong Porteño?Are you traveling to Buenos Aires – or you’re a local who wants to focus on street photography?Do you want to visit the best places to photograph the icons and the people of the city or you prefer to know those secret places of Buenos Aires?Maybe you want to spend an entire day learning the tips, tricks and secrets of a street photographer?Or do you want a unique portrait on that spot of Buenos Aires that you love?Book now and let´s go out to get around the city!
